name: react-vue-module-federation
description: Project created to validate the vite module federation plugin in order to consume react componentes inside vue applications

scripts.install:react-remote: cd react-remote-app && npm install && npm run build && npm pack && cd ..
scripts.install:vue2: cd vue2-host-app && npm install && npm install ../react-remote-app/react-remote-app-0.0.0.tgz && cd ..
scripts.install:vue3: cd vue-host-app && npm install && npm install ../react-remote-app/react-remote-app-0.0.0.tgz && cd ..
scripts.install:react-host: cd react-host-app && npm install && npm install ../react-remote-app/react-remote-app-0.0.0.tgz && cd ..
scripts.setup: npm run install:react-remote && npm run install:vue2 && npm run install:vue3 && npm run install:react-host
